languages.text: {n}С последним вздохом демона богохульные слова, змеясь, вползают вам в уши, скользят по границе разума и навеки впиваются в сердце. Кровь в ваших жилах вскипает — скверна, поднявшаяся из нее словно пар, изливается через ваш рот и глаза, смешиваясь с исчезающей оболочной поверженного демона... и обретая новую форму. В ваших руках — святыня Хаоса, напитанная неистовством Вог'Хайг'Самета и принявшая форму вашей души.{/n}

{n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С последним вздохом демона богохульные слова, змеясь, вползают вам в уши, скользят по границе разума и навеки впиваются в сердце. Кровь в ваших жилах вскипает — скверна, поднявшаяся из нее словно пар, изливается через ваш рот и глаза, смешиваясь с исчезающей оболочной поверженного демона... и обретая новую форму. В ваших руках — святыня Хаоса, напитанная неистовством Вог'Хайг'Самета и принявшая форму вашей души.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. You feel that they are endowing you with great power, but you can't make them out. This is a secret you'll only learn at death's door, with your very last heartbeat.{/n}

{n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. You feel that they are endowing you with great power, but you can't make them out. This is a secret you'll only learn at death's door, with your very last heartbeat.{/n}

The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

{n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}恶魔发出了最后的喘息，充满亵渎的话语渗入了你的耳中，沿着你的思想滑动。亵渎的利齿深深地嵌入你的心中，腐化仿佛蒸气一样，从你的血液中升腾而起。你血管中的血液开始沸腾，从你的嘴巴和眼睛里涌了出来，与殒命恶魔不断消散的躯壳融合在一起……构成了某种新的东西。你手中紧握着混沌的遗物，这件遗物由你的灵魂塑造而成，充满了沃格·希杰·萨梅斯的愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beim letzten Atemzug des Dämonen schlängeln sich blasphemische Worte in deine Ohren, gleiten am Rand deines Verstands entlang und schlagen für immer ihre Zähne in dein Herz. Das Blut in deinen Adern beginnt zu kochen, als die Verderbtheit wie Dampf daraus aufsteigt, ehe sie aus deinem Mund und deinen Augen dringt, mit der Hülle des gefallenen Dämons verschmilzt ... und eine neue Gestalt annimmt. Du hältst Ein Relikt des Chaos in der Hand, beseelt von Vog'Haik'Sameths Zorn und von deiner Seele geformt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Beim letzten Atemzug des Dämonen schlängeln sich blasphemische Worte in deine Ohren, gleiten am Rand deines Verstands entlang und hauen für immer ihre Zähne in dein Herz. Du spürst, dass sie dir gewaltige Macht verleihen, doch du kannst sie nicht ausmachen. Dieses Geheimnis wirst du erst an der Schwelle des Todes erfahren, mit deinem letzten Herzschlag.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El último estertor del daemon viene acompañado de palabras blasfemas que se introducen sibilinamente en tus oídos, reptan por los confines de tu mente y clavan sus colmillos en tu corazón de una vez por todas. La sangre hierve en tus venas y la corrupción brota como vapor de tu boca y tus ojos, fundiéndose con el cascarón del daemon caído, que se descompone por momentos... adoptando una nueva forma. Tienes en tus manos una reliquia del Caos imbuida con la furia de Vog'Haik'Sameth y moldeado por tu propia alma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

La sangre hierve en tus venas y la corrupción brota como vapor de tu boca y tus ojos, fundiéndose con el cascarón del daemon caído, que se descompone por momentos... adoptando una nueva forma. Tienes en tus manos una reliquia del Caos imbuida con la furia de Vog'Haik'Sameth y moldeado por tu propia alma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque le démon rend son dernier soupir, des mots blasphématoires se glissent dans votre oreille, se faufilent dans votre esprit, puis plantent leurs crocs dans votre cœur à tout jamais. Le sang qui coule dans vos veines se met à bouillir tandis que la corruption qu'il renferme s'évapore par votre bouche et vos yeux pour fusionner avec l'enveloppe du démon déchu... et prendre une forme nouvelle. Vous tenez entre vos mains une relique du Chaos imprégnée de la rage de Vog'Haik'Sameth et façonnée par votre âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque le démon rend son dernier soupir, des mots blasphématoires se glissent dans votre oreille, se faufilent dans votre esprit, puis plantent leurs crocs dans votre cœur à tout jamais. Le sang qui coule dans vos veines se met à bouillir tandis que la corruption qu'il renferme s'évapore par votre bouche et vos yeux pour fusionner avec l'enveloppe du démon déchu... et prendre une forme nouvelle. Vous tenez entre vos mains une relique du Chaos imprégnée de la rage de Vog'Haik'Sameth et façonnée par votre âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ディーモンの断末魔とともに、冒涜的な言葉があなたの耳に滑り込み、あなたの心の端を滑り、とこしえにあなたの心へとその牙を食い込ませる。あなたの血管を流れる血が沸騰し始め、腐敗が蒸気のように立ち上る。そして、それがあなたの口と目から溢れ出し、堕ちたるディーモンの消散しつつある殻と融合し…新たな姿となる。あなたは渾沌の遺物を手にしている。それはヴォッグ・ハイク・セイムスの怒りが込められ、あなたの魂によって形作られしものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever. The blood in your veins begins to boil as the corruption rises from it like steam, pouring out of your mouth and eyes, merging with the dissipating shell of the fallen daemon... and taking on a new form. You are holding a relic of Chaos, one imbued with the rage of Vog'Haik'Sameth and moulded by your very soul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İblisin son nefesiyle kulağına sızan meşum sözler, zihninin kenarından kayıyor ve dişlerini ebediyen kalbine geçiriyor. Damarlarındaki kan kaynarken yozluk da bir duman gibi içinden yükseliyor. Ağzından ve gözlerinden akıyor, ölü iblisin parçalanan kabuğuyla bir oluyor ve... Yeni bir şekle bürünüyor. Elinde bir Kaos yadigârı buluyorsun. Vog'Haik'Sameth'in hışmıyla dolu ve kendi ruhunun yoğurduğu bir yadigâr bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the daemon's last gasp, blasphemous words slither into your ears, slide along the edge of your mind, and sink their teeth into your heart forever.
